author: Phil Vickery
method: Place all of the ingredients except the parsley and Stilton into a small saucepan and cook over a high heat for 8-10 minutes, or until reduced and syrupy, then stir in the parsley. To serve, pour into a bowl, with a large wedge of Stilton alongside.
ingredients: 1 tbsp red wine vinegar,  50ml/2fl oz red wine,  2 tbsp soft brown sugar,  1 pear, peeled, cored and chopped,  1 red onion, chopped,  1 clove garlic, chopped,  handful fresh parsley, chopped,  large wedge of Stilton, to serve
